content.p: Thinking about life after Vet School? Join us at our Clinical Careers Fair to speak to over 30 graduate vet employers who want to recruit Nottingham vets. Find out about: As well as the opportunity to speak to employers, there will also be panel Q&A sessions during the day. This fair has now finished. Below you can find a list of the organisations that attended and follow the links to find their current vacancies. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
